name: SystemRandomNumberGenerator
desc: The system’s default source of random data.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new instance of the system’s default random number generator.

items.name: func next() -> UInt64
items.desc: Returns a value from a uniform, independent distribution of binary data.

items.name: func next<T>() -> T
items.desc: Returns a value from a uniform, independent distribution of binary data.

items.name: func next<T>(upperBound: T) -> T
items.desc: Returns a random value that is less than the given upper bound.
